((* if not is_first_entry *))
\vspace{<<design.margins.entry_area.vertical_between>>}
((* endif *))

\begin{onecolentry}
    \textbf{<<entry.position>>}, <<entry.company>>((* if entry.location *)) -- <<entry.location>>((* endif *)) \hfill <<entry.date_string>>
((* for item in entry.highlights *))
    ((* if loop.first *))
    \begin{highlights}
    ((* endif *))
        \item <<item>>
    ((* if loop.last *))
    \end{highlights}
    ((* endif *))
((* endfor *))
\end{onecolentry}
